00024 class module_error : public std::runtime_error {
00025 public:
00026   module_error(int evt,BaseModule* mod) 
00027     : std::runtime_error("")
00028     , fEvent(evt), fModule(mod)
00029   {}
00030   int fEvent;
00031   BaseModule* fModule;
00032 };

00061 //======================================================================
00062 void LoopSequence::Init()
00063 {
00064   // How many entries should we loop over?
00065   Long64_t nEntries = EventNavigator::Instance().GetInputNEntries();
00066   bool has_start = (fArgs.start > 0) && (fArgs.start < nEntries);
00067   fStart = (has_start) ? fArgs.start : 0;
00068   bool has_stop = (fArgs.stop > 0) && (fArgs.stop < nEntries);
00069   fStop = (has_stop) ? fArgs.stop : nEntries;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 void LoopSequence::Preprocess() const
00075 {
00076   EventNavigator& enav = EventNavigator::Instance();
00077   enav.GetEntry(fStart);
00078   int err_code =0;
00079   modules::navigator& mn = *modules::navigator::Instance();
00080   BaseModule* mod =NULL;
00081   for (modules::iterator it = mn.Begin(); it != mn.End() && !err_code; ++it) {
00082     mod = it->second;
00083     err_code |= mod->Preprocess(enav.GetRawData(), enav.GetSetupData());
00084   }
00085   if (err_code) throw preprocess_error(fStart,mod);
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 void LoopSequence::Process() const
00091 {
00092   EventNavigator& enav = EventNavigator::Instance();
00093   BaseModule* mod =NULL;
00094   for (Long64_t jentry = fStart; jentry < fStop; ++jentry){
00095     //This to move unrder event navigator
00096     TGlobalData* raw_data = enav.GetRawData();
00097     if (raw_data){
00098       raw_data->Clear("C");
00099       ClearGlobalData(raw_data);
00100     }
00101     
00102     Checkpoint(jentry);
00103     
00104     enav.GetEntry(jentry);
00105     int err_code = 0;
00106     modules::navigator& mn = *modules::navigator::Instance();
00107     for (modules::iterator it = mn.Begin(); it != mn.End() && ! err_code; ++it) {
00108       mod = it->second;
00109       err_code |= mod->ProcessGenericEntry(raw_data,enav.GetSetupData());
00110     }
00111     if (err_code) throw process_error(jentry,mod);
00112   
00113   }
00114   return;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 void LoopSequence::Postprocess() const
00120 {
00121   EventNavigator& enav = EventNavigator::Instance();
00122   int err_code =0;
00123   modules::navigator& mn = *modules::navigator::Instance();
00124   BaseModule* mod =NULL;
00125   for (modules::iterator it = mn.Begin(); it != mn.End() && !err_code; ++it) {
00126     mod = it->second;
00127     err_code |= mod->Postprocess(enav.GetRawData(), enav.GetSetupData());
00128   }
00129   if ( err_code ) throw postprocess_error(fStop-1,mod);
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00134 void LoopSequence::Run() const
00135 {
00136   try {
00137     this->Preprocess();
00138     this->Process();
00139     this->Postprocess();
00140   }
00141   catch (preprocess_error& e){
00142     std::cout << "\nError while preprocessing first entry (" 
00143               << e.fEvent << ")";
00144     if(e.fModule) std::cout<<" for module "<<e.fModule->GetName();
00145   }
00146   catch (process_error& e){
00147     try{
00148         // try to let each module finish to save plots etc
00149         this->Postprocess();
00150     } catch(...) {
00151         // if postprocess throws an error assume it's related to the process
00152         // error
00153         if(e.fModule) std::cout<<"\nModule "<<e.fModule->GetName();
00154         else std::cout << "\nA module";
00155         std::cout<<" returned non-zero on entry " << e.fEvent;
00156         throw;
00157     }
00158     if(e.fModule) std::cout<<"\nModule "<<e.fModule->GetName();
00159     else std::cout << "\nA module";
00160     std::cout<<" returned non-zero on entry " << e.fEvent;
00161   }
00162   catch (postprocess_error& e){
00163     if(e.fModule) std::cout<<"\nModule "<<e.fModule->GetName();
00164     else std::cout << "\nA module";
00165     std::cout<<" returned non-zero on during post-processing last entry " << e.fEvent;
00166   }
00167   catch (module_error& e){
00168     if(e.fModule) std::cout<<"\nModule "<<e.fModule->GetName();
00169     else std::cout << "\nA module";
00170     std::cout<<" returned non-zero on during pre-processing first entry " << e.fEvent;
00171   }
00172   std::cout << std::endl;
00173 }  
00174 
00175 
00176 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 void LoopSequence::Checkpoint(Long64_t entry) const
00178 {
00179   Long64_t n = entry-fStart;
00180   static Long64_t nTot = fStop-fStart;
00181   static int nDig = 1+std::floor(std::log10(nTot));
00182   if ( n  < 10 || n %(nTot/10)==0 ) {
00183     std::cout << "Processed  " << std::setw(nDig) << n 
00184               << "/" << std::setw(nDig) << nTot
00185               << "  (" <<std::setw(2)<< std::floor((100.*n) / nTot) 
00186               << "%)" << std::endl;  
00187   }
00188   return;
00189 }
